definition:
&%CoffeeGrindAttribute is a &%Class of 
&%RelationalAttribute used to describe the particle size of the &%CoffeeGrind.
opposite_reasoning: CoffeeGrindAttribute is a highly specific domain concept describing particle size of ground coffee. It lacks a true antonym but has a clear complementary opposite: whole unground beans. This represents the natural before-state that contrasts with the ground-state that CoffeeGrindAttribute describes. While this concept has limited AI safety relevance, for Fisher-LDA purposes it provides the strongest semantic opposition: ground (particulate, processed) vs whole (intact, unprocessed). This opposition captures a meaningful transformation axis in the coffee domain.
